effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves a clefairy into clefable, a jigglypuff into wigglytuff, a munna into musharna, a nidorina into nidoqueen, a nidorino into nidoking, or a skitty into delcatty.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves a Clefairy into Clefable, a Jigglypuff into Wigglytuff, a Munna into Musharna, a Nidorina into Nidoqueen, a Nidorino into Nidoking, or a Skitty into Delcatty.

flavor_text_entries.text: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.
